content: > whether for lounging or warming your > toes before bed these warm socks are > a wonderful quick knit *special pattern with collaboration for fibre space and their for new year s day cast on event 1 * **skill level** intermediate **sizes** a b c **finished measurements** blocked foot circumference 8 8½ 9 / 20 5 21 5 23 cm leg length 5½ / 14 cm **yarn** ***loopy mango mohair so soft *** 47% super kid mohair 53% extra fine merino 65 yds / 60 m per approx 50 g / 1 76 oz color london fog light grey 2 2 3 skeins *shown in size b and us women s foot size 8 * ***spincycle plump *** 100% superwash american wool 100 yds / 91 5 m per approx 100 g / 3 4 oz color under the wave 2 2 2 skeins *shown in size a and us women s foot size 8 * or approx 128 144 170 yds / 117 131 155 m of any other bulky weight yarn **needles** **for size a** us 10 5 6 5 mm for body of the sock set of 5 dpns or two circulars 24 or other preferred method of working small circumference in the round us 10 6 mm for ribbing only set of 5 dpns or two circulars 24 or other preferred method of working small circumference in the round **for size b** us 11 8 mm for body of the sock set of 5 dpns or two circulars 24 or other preferred method of working small circumference in the round us 10 5 6 5 mm for ribbing only set of 5 dpns or two circulars 24 or other preferred method of working small circumference in the round **for size c** us 13 9 mm for body of the sock set of 5 dpns or two circulars 24 or other preferred method of working small circumference in the round us 11 8 mm for ribbing only set of 5 dpns or two circulars 24 or other preferred method of working small circumference in the round or use size to obtain gauge **notions** 1 removable stitch marker stitch holder or barber cord or scrap of waste yarn tapestry needle **notes** this sock is worked toe-up in the round starting with the figure 8 cast on the toe that is shaped with increases the body of the sock is knit entirely in st st until the heel which is then shaped using german short row once that is completed the sock is resumed and finished with 2x2 ribbing worked on smaller size needle to make sure the sock can be worn up and folded as a cuff the sock is bound off using jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off method **gauge** *for size a* 14 sts & 22 row = 4 / 10 cm in st st on us 10 5 6 5 mm worked in the round measured once dry after washing and blocking *for size
